projects.title: Discord Bot
projects.category: Discord Bot for moderation and fun games.

projects.title: Senior Design Project
projects.category: This project is modifying a backpack sprayer used for weed killers, bug spray, or similar chemicals on small farms and acreages. Commercial backpack sprayers currently do not offer a "smart" option, making it difficult for users to keep track of product placement information. We will develop an iOS application, paired with an Arduino device inside the backpack, to meet project requirements and provide users with spray information. This application will store location, flow rate, time of coverage, and other relevant data. The purpose of our project is to simplify the lives of our client base and reduce waste caused by excess chemical coverage.

projects.title: Computer Science 309 Project
projects.category: Our team created a multiplayer chess application for Android. This included a chat function, scores with leaderboards and login features. In addition, we were required to create a backend server to handle connections between devices. Our server can handle multiple game rooms at a single time.

projects.title: Computer Engineering 288 Project
projects.category: Our team worked together to create code to control a Roomba robot to navigate a course with various sized objects. This project required us to have accurate object tracking with both IR sensors and Sonar sensors. We combined this data to represent the object's width and location.
